title: Great sword
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                           | Great sword                               |
| :--------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| Skill                                          | [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades") |
| [Damage](/Weapon_damage "Weapon damage")       | 17                                        |
| Accuracy                                       | -3                                        |
| [Base delay](/Weapon_speed "Weapon speed") (%) | 17 (170%)                                 |
| [Min delay](/Minimum_delay "Minimum delay")    | 7 at skill 20                             |
| [Hands](/Handedness "Handedness")              | 2H                                        |
| Size                                           | Large                                     |
| Ranged?                                        | No                                        |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A sword with a very long, heavy blade and a long handle.***"Quemadmodum gladius neminem occidit: occidentis telum est."("A sword by itself does not slay: it is merely the weapon used by the slayer.")-Lucius Annaeus Seneca, \_Epistulae Morales ad Lucilium\_, Letter LXXXVII: Some arguments in favor of the simple life, 1. 30. ca. 65 A.D.trans. Richard Mott Gummere, 1917. |

> This weapon falls into the '[Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")' category. It is a two handed weapon.

**Great swords** are large, two handed [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades") that deal good damage, though they require high Long Blades skill to reach minimum delay. [Triple swords](/Triple_sword "Triple sword") are stronger, but considerably rarer.

## Strategy

Great swords are rarely found on the Dungeon floor. However, they can occasionally generate on enemy [wights](/Wight "Wight"), [orc warriors](/Orc_warrior "Orc warrior"), [orc knights](/Orc_knight "Orc knight"), and a few other enemies.

You may prefer a [demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") or [double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword"); they deal slightly less damage, but can be worn with a [shield](/Shield "Shield"). However, both weapons are rarer. The great sword is considerably stronger than other one-handed Long Blades (such as the [scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar")).

|              | Image                                                                     |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Mundane**  | [![Greatsword1.png](/images/3/3e/Greatsword1.png)](/File:Greatsword1.png) |
| **Magical**  | [![Greatsword2.png](/images/c/cc/Greatsword2.png)](/File:Greatsword2.png) |
| **Artifact** | [![Greatsword3.png](/images/8/87/Greatsword3.png)](/File:Greatsword3.png) |

|                                                              | [Unrandart](/Unrandarts "Unrandarts") Great Swords                                       |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Sword of Power](/Sword_of_Power "Sword of Power")**       | [![Sword of power.png](/images/0/0b/Sword_of_power.png)](/File:Sword_of_power.png)       |
| **[Sword of Cerebov](/Sword_of_Cerebov "Sword of Cerebov")** | [![Sword of cerebov.png](/images/e/e0/Sword_of_cerebov.png)](/File:Sword_of_cerebov.png) |

## History

- In [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), Long Blades lost [riposte](/Riposte "Riposte"). Damage was increased back to pre-riposte levels.
- In [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), Long Blades gained riposte. Great swords were reduced by 2 base damage to compensate.
- In very early versions of *Crawl*, these (and triple swords) were governed by [their own skill](/Great_swords "Great swords").

| ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |

| [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")            | [Demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") • [Double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword") • [Eudemon blade](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") • [Falchion](/Falchion "Falchion") • [Great sword]() • [Long sword](/Long_sword "Long sword") • [Scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar") • [Triple sword](/Triple_sword "Triple sword")                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")                     | [Bardiche](/Bardiche "Bardiche") • [Demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") • [Glaive](/Glaive "Glaive") • [Halberd](/Halberd "Halberd") ([Scythe](/Scythe "Scythe")) • [Spear](/Spear "Spear") • [Trident](/Trident "Trident") • [Trishula](/Trishula "Trishula")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")   | [Arbalest](/Arbalest "Arbalest") • [Hand cannon](/Hand_cannon "Hand cannon") • [Longbow](/Longbow "Longbow") • [Orcbow](/Orcbow "Orcbow") • [Shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") • [Sling](/Sling "Sling") • [Triple crossbow](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

html:
Great sword

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Great sword
Skill Long Blades
Damage 17
Accuracy -3
Base delay (%) 17 (170%)
Min delay 7 at skill 20
Hands 2H
Size Large
Ranged? No


A sword with a very long, heavy blade and a long handle.

"Quemadmodum gladius neminem occidit: occidentis telum est."

("A sword by itself does not slay: it is merely the weapon used by the slayer.")

-Lucius Annaeus Seneca, _Epistulae Morales ad Lucilium_, Letter LXXXVII: Some arguments in favor of the simple life, 1. 30. ca. 65 A.D.

trans. Richard Mott Gummere, 1917.

This weapon falls into the 'Long Blades' category. It is a two handed weapon.

Great swords are large, two handed Long Blades that deal good damage, though they require high Long Blades skill to reach minimum delay. Triple swords are stronger, but considerably rarer.

Strategy

Great swords are rarely found on the Dungeon floor. However, they can occasionally generate on enemy wights, orc warriors, orc knights, and a few other enemies.

You may prefer a demon blade or double sword; they deal slightly less damage, but can be worn with a shield. However, both weapons are rarer. The great sword is considerably stronger than other one-handed Long Blades (such as the scimitar).

Image
Mundane
Magical
Artifact
Unrandart
Great Swords
Sword of Power
Sword of Cerebov

History

  • In 0.28, Long Blades lost riposte. Damage was increased back to pre-riposte levels.
  • In 0.19, Long Blades gained riposte. Great swords were reduced by 2 base damage to compensate.
  • In very early versions of Crawl, these (and triple swords) were governed by their own skill.
Weapons
Axes Battleaxe • Broad axe • Executioner's axe • Hand axe • War axe
Maces & Flails Club • Demon whip • Dire flail • Eveningstar • Flail • Giant club • Giant spiked club • Great mace • Mace (Hammer) • Morningstar • Sacred scourge • Whip
Long Blades Demon blade • Double sword • Eudemon blade • Falchion • Great sword • Long sword • Scimitar • Triple sword
Polearms Bardiche • Demon trident • Glaive • Halberd (Scythe) • Spear • Trident • Trishula
Ranged Weapons Arbalest • Hand cannon • Longbow • Orcbow • Shortbow • Sling • Triple crossbow
Short Blades Dagger • Quick blade • Rapier • Short sword
Staves Lajatang • Magical staff • Quarterstaff
Throwing Boomerang • Dart • Javelin • Large rock • Stone • Throwing net
